content.question: Which of the following statements about the function given by f(x) = x4 - 2x3 is true?

choices.label: The function has no relative extremum.
The graph of the function has one point of inflection and the function has two relative extrema.
The graph of the function has two points of inflection and the function has one relative extremum.
The graph of the function has two points of inflection and the function has two relative extrema.
The graph of the function has two points of inflection and the function has three relative extrema.

content.answer: The graph of the function has two points of inflection and the function has one relative extremum.

topic.text: 5.9: Connecting a Function, Its First Derivative, and Its Second Derivative

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
